properties.areaDesc: Etowah, AL; Cherokee, AL; Calhoun, AL; St. Clair, AL
properties.headline: Flood Warning issued February 11 at 11:57PM CST until February 13 at 6:00PM CST by NWS Birmingham AL
properties.description:
...The National Weather Service in Birmingham AL has issued a Flood
Warning for the following rivers in Alabama...

Coosa River At Gadsden Affecting Calhoun...Cherokee...Etowah and
St. Clair Counties.

.Heavy rainfall over the past 24 to 48 hours has led to rises across
the Coosa River basin... a flood warning is now in effect for the
Coosa River At Gadsden.

The National Weather Service in Birmingham AL has issued a

* Flood Warning for
the Coosa River At Gadsden.
* until Thursday evening...or until the warning is cancelled.
* At 11:00 PM Tuesday The stage Was 510.9 feet.
* Flood stage is 511.0 feet.
* Minor flooding is forecast.
* Forecast...rise above flood stage by after midnight tonight and
continue to rise to near 511.1 feet by tomorrow early afternoon.
The river will fall below flood stage by Thursday morning.
* Impact...At 511.0 feet...Low lying farm lands in the Gadsden area
begin to flood.
properties.instruction:
Do not drive cars through flooded areas. Turn Around...Don't Drown.

Another statement will be issued by Wednesday morning...or sooner if
conditions warrant.
